transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Executive: Hiren ji sir?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji namaskar kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya badhiya bataiye.
Executive: Sir Ravish baat kar raha tha India Mart se. Sir Saturday mein aapka phone aaya tha Saturday mein. Sorry for that particular time pe receive nahi kar paya main. Abhi pata nahi sir.
Customer: Kisne phone kiya tha?
Executive: Haan sir 9696 se aapne call kiya tha sir. That is the reason ki ek concern ho gaya tha mere paas. Ye ye wala apna hi number hai na 98 se chalu ho raha last mein 447 se?
Customer: Haan haan nahi wo galti se lag gaya tha. Main actually buyer ko contact karne ka try kar raha tha.
Executive: Okay Hiren sir.
Customer: Okay koi koi issue nahi hai sir. Touch ho gaya tha. Contact us mein touch ho gaya tha.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji. Haan isi wajah se basically sir yahan pe na ek basically apne regarding concern raise ho gaya tha. To phir isko to main close kar dunga koi dikkat to nahi hai isme?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Okay. Hiren sir theek hai iske regarding to koi issue nahi hai. Abhi last time jo apna discussion hua tha regarding services vagera ko leke to main dekh pa raha hu pichle kuch dino se matlab ek dedh hafte do hafte se apne yahan buylead consumption vagera thoda sa Hiren sir improve hua hai. Jo apna last discussion hua tha.
Customer: Main dekh raha hu na main khud hi abhi usme se hi kar deta hu application maine mobile mein hi dal diya hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji. Last time hamara aapko wahi discussion hua tha ki aap apne mobile mein application dal ke na aap khud se hi thodi si activity karte rahenge to wo jyada beneficial hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi abhi waise hi kar raha hu abhi.
Executive: Chaliye bahut achchi baat hai sir aap usko us tarike se karte rahiye. Baki Hiren sir jo aapne pichle ek hafte se thoda bahut India Mart pe activity ki jo thoda bahut buyleads consumption jo kiya hai matlab main dekh pa raha hu November mein total 9 10 buylead aapne consume ki hai hai na. Usme reply kaisa raha sir response kaisa dikh raha hai aapko? Kyunki buylead consume na hone ki wajah se basically sara portal waise hi pada tha. Abhi kaisi buyleads lagi aapko jo aapne consume ki?
Customer: Phone vagera phone vagera to aa rahe hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Okay. Aur baki contact bhi kar rahe hai directly bhi log.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Okay. Hiren sir badhiya hai koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Bahut achchi baat hai. Main calls ka nahi kar raha hu sir calls ki baat kare to jaise pichle mahine 17 call aaya is mahine mein abhi tak char call aa gaya hai to call mein koi doubt nahi hai sir. Aapke yahan se call receive ho rahi hai aap bhi receive kar rahe ho aur ye jo secondary number hai last mein 797 ye kiska number hai sir?
Customer: Ye Milan ka hai aadmi ka.
Executive: Achcha Milan sir ka number hai ye. Milan sir bhi sir matlab apna wo sirf accounts dekhte hain sir ya phir thoda bahut India Mart ka portal handle karte hain wo bhi?
Customer: Nahi wo kya hai alternate number hai agar ye mera receive nahi hota to wo receive kar leta hai.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Matlab let us suppose agar aap busy ho to kahin na kahin call call wo receive kar lete hain otherwise matlab India Mart ka portal aisa nahi.
Executive: Haan call miss na ho isliye wo number dala hua hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Hiren sir mere liye koi feedback jaise ki aapne jab buylead consumption chalu kiya hai to kahin na kahin aapne kuch dekha hoga kaisa buyleads vagera ya inquiries vagera apne kaam ki aa rahi hai jo aap matlab abhi consume kar rahe ho wo apne kaam ki hai sir?
Customer: Main kya kar raha hu consume apne jo kaam ki wahi consume kar raha hu baki dusri to main usko wo kar deta hu delete karke not we are not dealing in this particular product aise kar deta hu usko.
Executive: Okay okay. Sir very good matlab basically hame isi tarike se karna hai aap bilkul sahi kar rahe ho ki matlab jo buyleads hame apne kaam ki dikhe wo chahe area wise chahe order quantity wise aur chahe apni relevant theek hai jo apne kaam ki dikhe aapko usko consume kar lena hai aur let us suppose koi buylead aisa ho sakta hai ki ya location wise ki wajah se ya phir kisi reason ki wajah se wo aapko apne kaam ki na lag rahi ho.
Executive: To wahi buylead ke samne jo delete ka option hai wahan se aap usko reply karenge to hamare paas na ek feedback aa jayega ki is particular category mein ya is particular reason ki wajah se basically wo buyleads aap nahi consume kar rahe ho hai na?
Customer: Abhi waise hi kar rahe hai hum.
Executive: Okay. Hiren sir ek cheez aur hai abhi basically abhi aapne jab consume karna chalu kar diya hai to bahut achchi baat hai sir iske regarding na thoda sa sir ek baar na hame online aake mujhe ek cheez aapki aur sahi karwani hai ek example de de raha hu kya hai. Apne paas ek product hai JM42 AG article grinder theek hai ye apna product hai ye theek hai sir. Hmm. Abhi isme basically kya hota hai na kisi bhi particular product mein na hum minimum do do category dalte hain ki dekho naam dalne ko aap kuch bhi dal sakte ho sir lekin iske andar jo categories available hoti hai usi ke bihaf pe aapke paas buyleads ya usi ke bihaf pe aapke paas inquiry aati hai theek hai. To main is wajah se aap keh raha ki aap ek baar time nikaliye jab bhi aapko suitable lage jab bhi aapke paas time ho to ek baar hum 10 se 15 minute ke liye ek chhoti si video call karke mujhe category bahut se aise product hai na jisme sirf ek ek category dali hui hai sir. To agar hum inme do do category dal denge na to aap dekhoge thoda sa buyleads vagera hamari aur improve ho jayegi.
Customer: Koi baat nahi chaliye.
Executive: Theek hai ek baar please mujhe ek baar confirm time bataiyega baki is concern ko main close kar du na jo aapne 96 se call kiya tha jo galti se ho gaya tha.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir isko jab main close karunga na to ek feedback jayega aapke paas us feedback pe ek baar reply kar dijiyega theek hai sir. Satisfied reply kar dijiyega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called IndiaMART by mistake.

- Wants to improve buyleads.

- Needs help with product categorization.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the call was a mistake.

- Executive explained how to delete irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive offered assistance with product categorization via video call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide a suitable time for video call.

- Customer to provide feedback after the call is closed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, indiaMART portal
